articles.title: Penang bar named among 100 best bars in Asia for the first time ever - The Star Online
articles.description: Penang bar Backdoor Bodega has become the first bar from the state to be named in the 51-100 list by the Asia Best 50 Bars.
articles.content:
Penang bar Backdoor Bodega has become the first bar from the state to be named in the 51-100 list by the Asia Best 50 Bars.

articles.title: Singapore-based Believe raises $55 million in funding led by Venturi - Economic Times
articles.description: The new funds will be used to consolidate the company's market share in Bangladesh and India through acquisitions, as well as to expand its presence in the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) and Southeast Asia through organic and inorganic expansion.
